calculus Module¶

moglabo.pychalle.calculus.differentiate(fn, x, dx)[source]¶

Differentiate by standard definition. But an error to some extent.

moglabo.pychalle.calculus.simpson(fn, bottom, top, divnum=1000)[source]¶

Definite integral by simpson method.

moglabo.pychalle.calculus.trapezoid(upper, lower, divnum, func)¶

Integral caluclation by trapezoid approximation.

const_statistics Module¶

normal distribution limit value

moglabo.pychalle.const_statistics.CHI_TABLE = {1: 3.8399999999999999, 2: 5.9900000000000002, 3: 7.8099999999999996, 4: 9.4900000000000002, 5: 11.07}¶

F distribution table 95 percent level key : value = inner group degree of freedom : value of distribution

moglabo.pychalle.const_statistics.NORMAL_DIST_LIMIT = 1.96¶

t distribution table 95 percent level key : value = degree of freedom : value of distribution

moglabo.pychalle.const_statistics.T_TABLE = {1: 12.706, 2: 4.3029999999999999, 3: 3.1819999999999999, 4: 2.7759999999999998, 5: 2.5710000000000002, 6: 2.4470000000000001, 7: 2.3650000000000002, 8: 2.306, 9: 2.262, 10: 2.226, 11: 2.2010000000000001, 12: 2.1789999999999998, 13: 2.1600000000000001, 14: 2.145, 15: 2.1309999999999998, 16: 2.1200000000000001, 17: 2.1099999999999999, 18: 2.1009220000000002, 19: 2.093, 20: 2.0859999999999999, 21: 2.0800000000000001, 22: 2.0739999999999998, 23: 2.069, 24: 2.0640000000000001, 25: 2.0600000000000001, 26: 2.056, 27: 2.052, 28: 2.048, 29: 2.0449999999999999, 30: 2.0419999999999998, 40: 2.0209999999999999, inf: 1.96, 120: 1.98, 60: 2}¶
